-1.title: Manic and Depressed
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Welcome to My Nightmare
1.plot: Extreme hoarders Chris and Laurie are spiraling out of control. Their possessions are destroying their relationships and transforming their homes into virtual prisons. Change won't be easy, but it's their only hope of reclaiming their lives.

2.title: Beyond Embarrassment
2.plot: A 51-year-old man plans to abandon his hoard only to move back with his mother, a fellow hoarder. A woman's hoard is so severe that she runs the risk of having her house condemned.

3.title: Paralyzed by Clutter
3.plot: Extreme hoarder Mary Thompson is in denial while Anne Thomas fears she's passing down her compulsion to son Brendan. For decades they've had trouble discarding their belongings but will they finally gain clarity and get the help they so desperately need?

4.title: Life on Fire
4.plot: Wanda and Ray are extreme hoarders destined to lose their homes and live in isolation if they don't stop surrounding themselves with stuff. Making the change will be emotional and filled with anguish but they know that time is running out.

5.title: Family Secrets
5.plot: Two women who struggle with compulsive hoarding must get a handle on the piles of possessions that plague them. They have no choice but to ask for help - or they risk losing everything that matters to them and their families.

6.title: Filling the Void
6.plot: For Charlotte and Shelley, hoarding is both a comfort and a curse. If these two women can't find the strength to change, they risk being condemned to a lonely life where possessions replace people.

7.title: No One Would Choose This
7.plot: Two women must get their compulsive hoarding under control or face eviction and further alienation from their families. One lives amid personal treasures, the other amid a mountain of trash.

8.title: Everything Is at Stake
8.plot: For compulsive hoarders Cheryl and Michelle, their possessions are crowding out the people they love most. If they don't change their behavior soon, they may find themselves living alone, buried by their belongings.

9.title: A Million Excuses
9.plot: A family of four is on the brink of collapse under the weight of a mother and father's incessant hoarding. Mike Pyron is in denial that his addiction to auctions and garage sales has crossed the line into a full-blown compulsion.

1.title: Homeless Man with a House
1.plot: Bennie and Ronda both have houses full of stuff and lives filled with emptiness. Decades of compulsive hoarding has driven loved ones away. If they don't get help soon, their hopes for happiness may remain buried amid their possessions.

2.title: Robbing the Kids...
2.plot: Laura and Margaret are both mothers and extreme hoarders. Their parallel obsessions have made them prisoners in their own homes while tearing both of their families apart. Change won't be easy, but the consequences of inaction could be devasting.

3.title: Prison of Garbage
3.plot: Deborah and Mary both started hoarding in the wake of a personal tragedy. Ever since Deborah killed her drug-addicted boyfriend in self-defense, she and her son have lived amid growing piles of trash and unused possessions.

4.title: Everything's Junk
4.plot: For one woman, the trigger was the trauma she suffered on 9/11. For one man, it was the lasting effects of a brain hemorrhage. Compulsive hoarding has pushed them to a critical point in their lives. Now they must clean up, or risk losing it all.

5.title: Battle with Chaos
5.plot: Debbie knows that OCD drives her hoarding. Jeff doesn't believe he's a hoarder at all, but his kids think otherwise.

6.title: How Do I Get Out of This
6.plot: Linda's hoarding escalated as her marriage began deteriorating several years ago. Now, her entire family is on the brink of collapse. Norski has overcome addictions to drugs and alcohol but kicking the hoarding habit may prove even harder.

7.title: The Scariest Place on Earth
7.plot: If compulsive hoarder Michael can't clean his house in six weeks, he will go to jail. Meanwhile a motivational speaker manages everyone's lives - except her own.

8.title: The Mess I've Created
8.plot: Joyce's compulsive collecting almost cost her husband his life, while Norine's hoarding forced her teenage daughter out of the house and now threatens to destroy what's left of their relationship.

9.title: This is Where You Sleep??
9.plot: Debbie turned to hoarding after a shocking confession ended her marriage. Meanwhile, with disease and illness plaguing her family, Julie hoards to ease the pain.

10.title: Nowhere Near Normal
10.plot: Extreme Hoarder Jahn struggles to clear her belongings from not one, but two houses before both are condemned.

11.title: I Want to Cuss
11.plot: A woman's out of control obsession with bikinis, sweaters and dresses threatens to destroy her relationship with her only daughter.

12.title: Oh My Gosh
12.plot: Conditions inside Tammy's home have become so bad, that she's forced to eat her meals in the car and her sick father is unable to return home from the hospital.

13.title: Better Get a Dumpster
13.plot: Compulsive hoarder Sharon gets caught stealing from her neighbor's home while Len must choose between his hoard and his daughter.

14.title: Overwhelming Pile of Junk
14.plot: After decades of hoarding, Debbie has not only lost the comforts of home but the company of her four children as well. Chip's compulsive hoarding has forced his family of six to squeeze into 1600 square feet of living space.

15.title: My Biggest Embarrassment
15.plot: While Patti's extreme hoarding has made it virtually impossible for her daughter to live with her, Jonathan's obsession has kept his three-year-old son from even coming in the door.

16.title: It's Out of Control
16.plot: Decades of extreme hoarding have put Kay's marriage in serious jeopardy while Toni's compulsive shopping has made her own home a danger zone for her two-year-old granddaughter.

17.title: Like a Dog in a Cage
17.plot: A mother desperately tries to protect her children from their father's hoard, while an artist chooses frogs, penguins and banana peels over her live-in boyfriend.

18.title: It's a Freaking War Zone
18.plot: The tumbling piles of Maggie's collections are putting her own son's life at risk while Bob's all consuming passion for swimming pool parts is pushing his family to the brink.

1.title: Surviving on Trash
1.plot: Pregnant with her first child, Traci is desperate to move back into her childhood home. But it's filled floor to ceiling with her mother's stuff. Now the two must work together to clear a decades worth of clutter before it's too late.

2.title: There Are Mice Everywhere
2.plot: Compulsive hoarder Kathleen discovers a hoard of mice living in her kitchen numbering in the thousands. And for extreme hoarder Jaime's future son-in-law, spending the night in a hoard might very well end a marriage before it even begins.

3.title: Not a Safe Place
3.plot: Extreme Hoarder Renee almost died when emergency workers responding to a 911 call were unable to get through her front door. With her home now declared unlivable by the authorities, Renee knows she needs to make a change.

4.title: A Horrible Sight
4.plot: Rick desperately tries to salvage his cluttered home that was nearly destroyed in a house fire. Just five years ago, Linda was homeless. If she can't get her house up to code in 60 days, they'll take it away and she'll be back on the streets.

5.title: I Was Gonna Gag
5.plot: The unsafe conditions in and around the home of extreme hoarder Floyd have been brought to the attention of Child Protection Services. Now he must clear his hoard or risk losing his three-year-old son Charlie.

6.title: Is That a Goat?
6.plot: Retired US Marine, Donny, has been to jail twice because of his hoard. With the county at his door, the clutter has put his freedom in jeopardy yet again. And while Joyce sees comfort in her doll collection, everyone else sees a creepy obsession.

7.title: Stop Touching My Stuff!
7.plot: It takes most hoarders a years to fill a home with stuff. For 16-year-old, Haley, it can take less than a week to fill a bedroom. Her parents can only hope that a visit with an extreme hoarder who's lost it all will finally scare their daughter straight.

8.title: Overtaken by Puppets
8.plot: Once a professional ventriloquist, Donna's career has since turned into an obsession with hundreds of puppets in her home and her life. For compulsive hoarder Harold, being a good father is difficult when your daughter isn't even allowed inside your home.

9.title: I Can't Breathe
9.plot: Larina is a single mother and on the verge of losing custody of her 10-year-old daughter as a result of years of compulsive hoarding. But when confronted with the challenge to let go of her clutter, Larina's compulsion threatens to win the battle.

10.title: Tiny Monsters
10.plot: Sherry's hoard has broken up her marriage. Now, authorities are threatening to take away her children and condemn her home. With only weeks to clean it up, Sherry could lose everything she loves.

11.title: My House Can Kill Me
11.plot: Hsi Ming and Miranda are both mothers and extreme hoarders. Miranda's obsession has left her twin toddlers with no room to play amongst the hoard. Hsi-Ming's daughter is concerned for the health and safety of her mother.

12.title: Owned by the Roaches
12.plot: Celia is a psychologist who helps other but can't solve her own hoarding problem. Now she's losing the battle against her stuff and the millions of roaches infesting her home.

13.title: I'm Dumbfounded
13.plot: After years of hoarding, Vickie and Jeff's marriage is at its breaking point. Beyond the stress of the clutter on their relationship, Vickie reveals the secrets she's been keeping from him. Will there be any chance left of saving their marriage?

14.title: It's Just Sex
14.plot: Janet and Herv have kept their hoarding a secret from everyone. But as they confront the clutter, shocking secrets concerning their relationship and sex lives are coming to light. Now, they are in a fight to save their house - and their marriage.

15.title: Worst I've Ever Seen
15.plot: The city is threatening to demolish Caryn's home and if the condition doesn't change, the consequences could be devastating. Theresa is putting her stuff before her children in their time of greatest need and could end up losing everything.

16.title: A Bomb Went Off
16.plot: Phyllis' neighbors are complaining about the trash bags piling up outside of her home, while the inside of her home is so packed that she can barely move around. Faye, who suffers from COPD, realizes her hoard is killing her.

17.title: Unbelievable
17.plot: Brad isn't sure why he hoards but he is certain that piles of clothing, expired foods, and other items have taken over his mobile home. Meanwhile, Mary has been evicted and has just weeks to clean out decades of stuff or have her home condemned.

18.title: Are You Serious?
18.plot: Hoarding has destroyed Carol's relationship with her daughter. Now, she has one final chance to clean up, or say goodbye to her forever. Also, Amy's years of collecting have turned into a massive hoard. With her home nearly unlivable, she seeks help.

19.title: Where Are They Now?
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: This Is Garbage Land
1.plot: Compulsive hoarder and Elvis impersonator, Cary, spends his days collecting Elvis memorabilia. But volatile relationships with friends and a paralyzing obsession with the king of rock and roll has left his New York City apartment virtually uninhabitable.

2.title: As Bad as It Gets
2.plot: After over twenty years in the same apartment, compulsive hoarder Randy is being forced to leave by order of his landlord. With only days to accomplish the task, Randy must somehow clear out the eight-foot-high mountains of stuff.

3.title: Sleeping in a Dumpster
3.plot: Laura's collecting has spiraled into a compulsion that has left the relationships with her two sons on the brink of collapse. When a potentially devastating house fire ignites during her clean-up effort, it puts everyone's safety in jeopardy.

4.title: This Is Unreal
4.plot: Milton has always loved to shop. But after losing his mother, it became a compulsion that soon took over his life. Louise has been diagnosed with cancer and the unhealthy living conditions of her home are only making the reality of the prognosis worse.

5.title: Just Tear It Down
5.plot: Like most hoarders, Darlene and Doug's home is packed. But the hoard is just the beginning of their problems. A collapsing roof, mold, and an overflowing septic tank has caught the attention of city code enforcement, making eviction a real possibility.

6.title: Twenty of Everything
6.plot: After 30 years of hoarding, Gary's house is so full that he is forced to sleep outside on a makeshift bed. With the city now threatening eviction, Gary must face the harsh reality: clean up or watch his home be condemned.

7.title: Hoo, This Reeks!
7.plot: Kathy's extreme hoarding forced her 12-year-old son to move out of their home. Five years later, their relationship is at a crossroad. Now Kathy must make a drastic change or risk losing her son forever.

8.title: A Humongous Secret
8.plot: When Dennis quit drinking, a new compulsion took over: hoarding. Now, severe debt and clutter have him moments away from losing it all. Monte has accumulated a massive, couture-clothing hoard, and destroyed a relationship with her son in the process.

9.title: It's My Junk
9.plot: When Eileen admits a dark secret to her family, the situation quickly escalates beyond hoarding to a matter of life and death. Compulsive hoarder Dale has packed not one, but five houses full of clutter.

10.title: You're Not Taking My Kids
10.plot: When Child Protection Services removes Karen's children from her home, she is given just 48 hours to clean up or risks losing custody of her kids permanently.

11.title: Holding Mom Hostage
11.plot: When hot-tempered David moved back in with his 93-year-old mother, he quickly filler her home with clutter. Now, the dangerous living conditions, and David's short fuse, have his elderly mom cornered.

12.title: This House Killed Her
12.plot: After their mother's death, siblings Aimee, Cheryl and Jimmy are left to deal with a house filled with clutter. In a desperate search for answers and vital documents, they bring in the aid of a medium to help solve the mystery.

13.title: She Wants It, She Takes It
13.plot: Rhonda's home is filled with items she's found in the dumpster, it is so full in fact, that she has been forced to live in a camper parked in the backyard. Now, with neighbors threatening lawsuits and worse, Rhonda must clean up or risk losing everything.

14.title: What a Pig
14.plot: Compulsive hoarder Valerie risks eviction when her next-door neighbor reports her to the health department. Meanwhile, Ann's house is so filled with clutter that she has been reduced to a 3 sq. ft space in her living room

15.title: They're Crawling
15.plot: Kay's denies that she is a hoarder, but a home filled with clutter and deadly vermin tells another story. Now, the city is just days away from condemning Kay's home. But the biggest challenge could be convincing her that she has a problem.

16.title: One Is Good. Two Is Better
16.plot: As a top model on the Hollywood scene, Louise once ran with Tinseltown's elite. But behind her colorful outfits and personality, she still keeps a dark secret: Louise is a compulsive hoarder. Now, Louise and her lavish hoard - could end up on the street.

17.title: She's Going to Jail
17.plot: Joanne's hoarding is so extreme that the city has already sent her to jail four times. Also, Home buyers Tad and Amber purchased a family home sight unseen. Not until now do they realize that the house comes along with massive hoard.

18.title: I'm a Rockstar, Baby!
18.plot: As the lead singer of one of Canada's most famous rock bands, Kelly Jay has lived quite a life and he has collected a massive hoard to prove it. Now, with his family ready to call it quits, Kelly must choose between his clutter and the people he loves.

1.title: Losing Half Myself
1.plot: Phyllis and Patty aren't just identical twins, they're identical twin hoarders. They've transformed every home in which they've ever lived into a complete disaster area. Now, after losing one house can they save their current home from being condemned?

2.title: Leading a Double Life
2.plot: What's it like to live downstairs from a hoarder? Lalie and her children suffer the effects of mold, mice and flea infestations because their upstairs neighbor and landlord, Denise, has secretly acquired a massive hoard.

3.title: Somewhere in My Pile
3.plot: Beverly's clutter has filled every last square inch of her home. Upstairs, her three beloved dogs have made the space absolutely unlivable. With the threat of the city condemning her home, Beverly must clear the hoard or risk losing everything.

4.title: Where Are They Now?
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: Waste Not, Want Not
5.plot: Terry and Bill seem to be the perfect couple,but their dark secret has put their relationship in jeopardy. The tragic murder of her daughter drove Nancy to hoarding. Now, if she can't clear her home, she may just lose her husband as well.

6.title: The Last Clear Spot
6.plot: The giant, toppling piles of clutter are more dangerous to Jessica, who a little person, who in tandem with her mother Dale, has filled her entire home with stuff.

7.title: Full of Rats
7.plot: Property investors get more than they bargained for when the house they purchased is occupied by hoarder Michelle and a rat infestation so bad, it has compromised the building's foundation.

8.title: You're Gonna Die in Here
8.plot: Once a respected high school principal, Wayne's life changed when he was the target of a thwarted school shooting. Now paralyzed by PTSD and compulsive hoarding, Wayne has virtually barricaded himself inside his home and in turn, has abandoned his family.

9.title: My Teeth Are Lost in the Pile
9.plot: When Kyle first met Lynn, he thought she was the answer to all of his problems, but years later, she's transformed his home into a heap of trash. Now on the verge of foreclosure, the couple will either get along enough to clean, or kill each other trying.

10.title: It's a Horror Story
10.plot: When Frank asked his girlfriend Susan to move in, he wasn't expecting her to fill his house with clutter, though it should come as no surprise; just two blocks away, Susan's home for forty-eight years sits condemned due to the massive hoard inside.

11.title: Running Out of Time
11.plot: Geoffrey has already lost his home. Now, he has just 30 days to clear the clutter from the home or he will lose everything that remains inside it - including his two children.

12.title: A VCR for Every Day of the Week
12.plot: John and Joe are a father and son duo who both hoard. John faces jail time for his compulsions, while Joe could lose his newborn son to child protective services if they don't clean up their mess.

13.title: Three Apartments, Three Hoarders
13.plot: An unprecedented edition of Hoarding: Buried Alive features an apartment complex with not one, not two, but three extreme hoarders. For years their hoarding has gone unchecked but with building now under strict management, everything is about to change.

14.title: The Donald Trump of Hoarding
14.plot: Extreme hoarder Mike is about to undergo surgery that could save his life. But the biohazards inside his filthy home puts his recovery at serious risk. If he doesn't clean out his house now, he will die in his hoard.

15.title: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Boat
15.plot: Ken's entire world revolves around his girlfriend. But as years of hoarding have taken its toll on their relationship, she's giving him one last chance to clear out. And Lea is at risk of losing her children if she can't clean her clutter.

16.title: Worse Than a Haunted House
16.plot: One mother's battle with hoarding is overshadowed by the discovery of her own daughter's compulsion to hold on to things; while another mother is putting her family's unity on the line and her husband's life at risk with her own extreme hoarding problem.

17.title: Graveyard of Junk
17.plot: It's the most extreme roach infestation ever seen on Hoarding: Buried Alive - and if Seymour can't conquer it and clear out the hoard in his house, the city will condemn the home and leave him homeless.

18.title: The Stench Is Amazing
18.plot: If Tim doesn't grow up and get his home cleaned before his inheritance runs out, he'll lose the house and end up out on the street. A similar fate is in store for twin brothers Lorrin and Orin if their decades-long compulsion can't be curbed.

19.title: It's a Rat's Nest
19.plot: If Doug doesn't get a handle on his extreme compulsion to collect things within the month, he stands to lose not one, but two house he's filled with clutter.

imdb.title: Hoarding: Buried Alive
plot: With the help of experts, men and women fight to find a way to defeat their unhealthy obsession; hoarding.
